replies.body: Anyone know what the title means? I'm bi-a lot of things but lingual is not one of them.

Hello. I've edited your post to remove the players names. While it's understandable to be frustrated at someone Name and Shame is not allowed on the forums. If you reported them after the game then your job is done, though if need be you could always file a Support Ticket about them. If you do then just know that due to privacy reasons they won't tell you of any disciplinary actions taken against them.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) for any questions about this removal.

Thank you, and have a good day.

-Prandine
unless you can prove that they _**PURPOSEFULLY**_ demoted you, they did nothing wrong.
Are you sure the 3 of them weren't just having a bad game? Riot won't punish them unless that can be proved beyond a reasonable doubt, and probably not even then.

You should keep their names our of the discussion. Its fine to identify what they say but you should keep their identity to yourself.

BTW you spelled a few words wrong.

> If the intent is simply to discuss a particular behavior it's okay to post that on the Player Behavior board, but posts naming a player to shame/report them will be removed. - Deep Terror Nami

I get that you are frustrated but the method by which your are approaching this is wrong.
It's on the Board User Guide.
